languages.text: "Воистину, кровь в моих жилах и материя моей души чужды вашим — я из тех, кого твои сородичи зовут ксеносами. Я явила себя твоим собратьям, чтобы принести мир на Лилэтан и помочь правительнице против ее врагов. Будешь ли ты говорить со мной, как с равной, или мы ступим под тень Каэла Менша Кхейна?"

traits.locale_text: "Воистину, кровь в моих жилах и материя моей души чужды вашим — я из тех, кого твои сородичи зовут ксеносами. Я явила себя твоим собратьям, чтобы принести мир на Лилэтан и помочь правительнице против ее врагов. Будешь ли ты говорить со мной, как с равной, или мы ступим под тень Каэла Менша Кхейна?"

languages.text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"
languages.original_text: "Воистину, кровь в моих жилах и материя моей души чужды вашим — я из тех, кого твои сородичи зовут ксеносами. Я явила себя твоим собратьям, чтобы принести мир на Лилэтан и помочь правительнице против ее врагов. Будешь ли ты говорить со мной, как с равной, или мы ступим под тень Каэла Менша Кхейна?"

traits.locale_text: "In truth, the blood in my veins and the matter of my soul are foreign to yours — I am of that kind that your fellows call xenos. I came here to your kind to bring peace to the Lilaethan and aid the ruler against her enemies. Will you speak with me as with an equal, or will we step under the shadow of Kaela Mensha Khaine?"

"In truth, the blood in my veins and the matter of my soul are foreign to yours — I am of that kind that your fellows call xenos. I came here to your kind to bring peace to the Lilaethan and aid the ruler against her enemies. Will you speak with me as with an equal, or will we step under the shadow of Kaela Mensha Khaine?"

"In truth, the blood in my veins and the matter of my soul are foreign to yours — I am of that kind that your fellows call xenos. I came here to your kind to bring peace to the Lilaethan and aid the ruler against her enemies. Will you speak with me as with an equal, or will we step under the shadow of Kaela Mensha Khaine?"

"My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

languages.text: “我们与你的族人没有任何相似之处。你的族人称呼我们为‘异形’，就好像我们都属于同一个种族一样。我来这里是为了守护莉莱赞，协助总督对付她的敌人。你是否愿意听我说话？还是说，你的训诫让你闭目塞听？”
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: “事实上，我血管里的血液，以及我灵魂中的物质，与你们都不一样。你们的伙伴们称呼我们为‘异形’。我来这里，是为了给莉莱赞带来和平，帮助这里的统治者对付她的敌人。你是否愿意与我平等对话？还是说，我们将会步入血手凯恩的阴影之下？”

languages.text: «Mi alma es totalmente ajena a la tuya. Los tuyos nos denominan xenos, como si fuéramos todos iguales. Vine aquí para proteger el Lilaethan y ayudar a vuestra gobernadora contra sus enemigos. ¿Escucharás mis palabras o dejarás que los preceptos obnubilen tu razón?».
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: «A decir verdad, la sangre de mis venas y la composición de mi alma son totalmente ajenas a las tuyas: pertenezco a lo que tu especie denomina xenos. Vine aquí, con tu gente, para traer la paz al Lilaethan y ayudar a su líder contra sus enemigos. ¿Hablarás conmigo como una igual o debemos pasar bajo la sombra de Kaela Mensha Khaine?».

languages.text: 「我が魂はあなた達の魂とは別物…まるでひとつの種族であるかのように、人間は我らを異種族と呼ぶ。我は、総督の敵に対抗し、リラエタンを守るためにここに来た。さて、我の話を聞くつもりはあるか？それとも、己の教義に目を曇らせるのか？」
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: 「我が魂はあなた達の魂とは別物…まるでひとつの種族であるかのように、人間は我らを異種族と呼ぶ。我は、総督の敵に対抗し、リラエタンを守るためにここに来た。さて、我の話を聞くつもりはあるか？それとも、己の教義に目を曇らせるのか？」

languages.text: "Meine Seele ist mit der Euren nicht zu vergleichen ... Ihr bezeichnet uns als Xenos, als wären wir alle gleich. Ich kam hierher, um Lileath zu beschützen, indem ich den Gouverneur gegen ihre Feinde unterstützte. Werdet Ihr mich anhören oder folgt Ihr blind Euren Vorschriften?"
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: "Es stimmt, das Blut in meinen Adern und meine Seele sind anders als bei Euch – ich gehöre zu jenen, die Euresgleichen Xenos nennt. Ich bin zu Euch gekommen, um Frieden für Lileath zu bringen und die Herrscherin gegen ihre Feinde zu unterstützen. Werdet Ihr auf Augenhöhe mit mir sprechen, oder werden wir unter den Schatten von Kaela Mensha Khaine treten?"

languages.text: « Mon âme n'a rien de commun avec les vôtres, même si vos semblables nous mettent tous dans le même panier sous l'étiquette de "xénos". Je suis venue ici pour protéger la lilaethan en soutenant la gouverneure face à ses ennemis. Êtes-vous {mf|prêt|prête} à m'écouter ou allez-vous vous laisser aveugler par vos préjugés ? »
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: « En vérité, le sang dans mes veines et la substance de mon âme sont étrangers à vos semblables. Je suis ce que vous appelez une xénos. Je suis venue ici afin d'apporter la paix à la lilaethan et d'aider sa dirigeante à lutter contre ses ennemis. Me parlerez-vous d'égal à égal, ou devons-nous nous faire face dans l'ombre de Kaela Mensha Khaine ? »

languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

languages.text: "Ruhum sizinkine kardeş değil. Türünüz, sanki hepimiz birmişiz gibi bize zeno diyor. Buraya, düşmanlarına karşı valiye yardımcı olmaya ve Lilaethan'ı korumaya geldim. Bana kulak verecek misiniz yoksa zihninizi körleştiren ön yargıların esiri mi olacaksınız?"
languages.original_text: "My soul is nothing kin to yours — your kind call us xenos, as if we are all as one. I came here to protect the Lilaethan by assisting the governor against her enemies. Will you hear me, or be blinded to sense by your precepts?"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhum sizinkine kardeş değil. Türünüz, sanki hepimiz birmişiz gibi bize zeno diyor. Buraya, düşmanlarına karşı valiye yardımcı olmaya ve Lilaethan'ı korumaya geldim. Bana kulak verecek misiniz yoksa zihninizi körleştiren ön yargıların esiri mi olacaksınız?"
